data.description: Interface to C6 servers, via c6term
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
C6 is an Italian instant messaging system, similar to ICQ. This
    module is an interface to C6 using the c6term program
    (http://openc6.extracon.it), so the name Net::C6Term seems
    appropriate for it.
